Atlanta.Beath\u2013Dickey House: The Beath–Dickey House (1890) is a Queen Anne Victorian house located at 866 Euclid Avenue in the Inman Park neighborhood of Atlanta, Georgia. It was one of the houses of note when the Inman Park – Atlanta's first streetcar suburb – was established. John M. Beath was an "ice magnate", owner of the Georgia Ice Company on Alabama St.
